channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Eating your meals at these exact times could boost your energy levels and prevent chronic disease
item.description: Here’s expert-backed advice on how to time your meals and craft your day’s eating schedule.

item.title: Zeldin to pursue new ban on animal testing at EPA
item.description: Administrator Lee Zeldin plans to revive a ban on animal testing at the Environmental Protection Agency, The Washington Times has learned.

item.title: Why Is Trump’s DOJ Hiding An FBI Informant’s Deposition On The Oklahoma Bombing?

item.title: Andy Jassy asked Amazon employees to call out all the red tape at the company and received almost 1,000 replies

item.title: Everything You Need To Know About Three Massive Religious Liberty Cases Before SCOTUS

item.title: This Supreme Court Is Woefully Weak On The Second Amendment
item.description: When firearms are involved, originalism is ignored and basic principles of statutory interpretation are overlooked.

item.title: Don’t move fast and break things—even with AI. Slowing down to speed up works better
item.description: Harnessing the potential of AI doesn't require moving more quickly—it requires deeper thinking and a long-term purpose.

item.title: Shopify is saying the quiet part out loud: AI will replace new hiring—other CEOs just won’t admit it
item.description: It is time for CEOs to level with their employees and for society to get ready for a world with fewer jobs.

item.title: Privatize the Postal Service

item.title: Congress Must Assert Itself on Tariffs
item.description: My bill would require Congress to approve any presidential proposal to impose tariffs before they are put into effect.

item.title: Do It for Bill
